title: 欢迎女王大人莅临嘟嘟熊的博客
text: 欢迎女王大人莅临嘟嘟熊的博客，让嘟嘟熊的博客蓬荜生辉，嘟嘟熊倍感荣幸！！！ Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
